homepage.math1_description: The Grade 1 Mathematics course in the Chân Trời Sáng Tạo curriculum helps students grasp basic mathematical concepts such as arithmetic, addition, subtraction, and simple geometry. With a creative and practical teaching approach, the course not only develops logical thinking and problem-solving skills but also inspires a love for mathematics, providing a solid foundation for future learning stages.
homepage.math2_description: The Grade 2 Mathematics course in the Chân Trời Sáng Tạo curriculum provides comprehensive content and textbook exercises, helping students complete their assignments effectively. The course includes detailed Grade 2 math exercises and easy-to-understand instructions, enabling students to master the material and solve exercises from both Volume 1 and Volume 2.
homepage.literature1_description: The Vietnamese Grade 1 course in the Chân Trời Sáng Tạo curriculum provides detailed, comprehensive lessons that closely follow the textbook program. The course helps students master basic skills such as reading, writing, pronunciation, and handwriting practice, fostering early language development. With diverse and easy-to-understand content, it enables first graders to quickly grasp concepts, laying a strong foundation for future grades and building confidence in using Vietnamese in daily life.
homepage.literature2_description: The Vietnamese Grade 2 course in the Chân Trời Sáng Tạo curriculum helps children fully develop their language skills. With a rich program, students will master grammar, vocabulary, and improve their reading and writing abilities. Through interactive lessons and creative exercises, children not only learn but also develop logical thinking, ignite a passion for learning, and prepare for higher levels of education.

footer.introduction: The application aims to encourage children's thinking and exploration through interactive lessons, helping to develop reading, writing, and problem-solving skills. A fun learning environment nurtures a passion for learning while providing tools to assess progress and promote collaboration among students.
